verses.name: Leviticus 27:22
verses.text: And if a man sanctify unto the Lord a field which he hath bought, which is not of the fields of his possession;

verses.name: Leviticus 27:23
verses.text: Then the priest shall reckon unto him the worth of thy estimation, even unto the year of the jubile: and he shall give thine estimation in that day, as a holy thing unto the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 27:24
verses.text: In the year of the jubile the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong.
